name: Digital Strategics
tag_list: website-design, website-development, online-strategy, identity-design, ecommerce, websites, flash-presentations
overview:
Digital Strategics, does pretty much everything required to help clients find solutions for their online presence related conundrums.

As a digital strategy firm, Digital Strategics helps clients create and execute the right digital strategy for them. From building websites that reflect their business objective to helping them connect with customers, creating content that help them get discovered by search engines to providing their business direction to optimise their web presence.

The key areas of expertise offered by Digital Strategics are:

  • Website Design & Build
  • Branding, Creative & Design
  • Microsites & Intranet Design & Build
  • Facebook Applications
  • Flash-based outputs - banners, presentations
